# INTRODUCTION

The workshop materials can be accessed on the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/pbs-assess/TTTworkshop).

## Participants

Workshop participants are listed in \autoref{tabParticipants}.

\begin{table}
\centering
\caption[Workshop participants]{Participants in the {TESA} workshop on tools for transparent, traceable, and transferable assessments.}
```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
# Import participants and format for latex
participants <- read_csv( file="../tables/Participants.csv", col_names=TRUE,
  col_types=cols() ) %>%
  # arrange( Region, Name ) %>%
  xtable( align=c("l", "l", "l") ) %>%
  print( booktabs=TRUE, floating=FALSE, include.rownames=FALSE,
    sanitize.colnames.function=Bold2, sanitize.text.function=identity )
```
\label{tabParticipants}
\end{table}
